website_summaries.verdict: Alternative wing-design ear gels for comfort, better wearability, and improved sound. Available in four attractive colors.
pros: Ear gels provide better audio and stability
The microphones are constructed comfortably from soft and contoured gel
The large drivers in microphones enhance the sound clarity and intensity
Set includes an in-line remote with volume and phone control
cons: These are popular earbuds but didn't remain operational for as long as some people expected

customer_reviews.title: Finally earphones that stay in!
customer_reviews.text: I hate those earbuds that wedge into your ears like earplugs. I dislike that sensation entirely, but regular earbuds just don't stay in my ears well, especially when jogging or working out. It's weird how one little soft rubber piece makes a world of difference! The sound from these is just fine. If you are looking for noise-cancelling earphones, I hope you have a rearview mirror on while you run. They work great, with no discernible static or interference and the controls work the same as my regular Samsung earphones. I also splurged a few extra dollars and bought a pack of replacement covers with the same soft rubber additions in case needed. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: L. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sound - Only Lasted Me a Few Months
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these were okay, but I got these because I read that they were rugged and might last a good long time. These only lasted me a few months before one headphone died from an issue somewhere in the cable. I listen to a lot of stuff on my phone with it in my pocket, this tends to strain my headphones over time. The search for headphones that can withstand being in my phone in my pocket continues...
customer_reviews.author: aidanblake

customer_reviews.title: The BEST in-ear headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best in ear headphones I've ever had! I don't like earbuds that go deeper into the ear canal - it's uncomfortable, and can cause ear infections. These earphones have a bud just slightly indented, to keep them in place, but they dont't cause discomfort! Even the active attachment is so soft you can't even feel it, and fits right in the outer ear curves! My boyfriend got a pair as soon as I showed him mine, and we are both happy campers. We've been using these daily for 3 months for meetings, and I run with them, also do cycling.
customer_reviews.author: TaskMe

customer_reviews.title: 3-4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for earphones with the Samsung controls. This did exactly that, the only problem is that the sound quality is so below what I was expecting. It's not the worst I've heard, and for the function of the inline controls alone I see value in keeping them. But if it wasn't for that I wouldn't keep these. I was bouncing between 3 and 4 stars, but since it does what I want it to do, and the sound quality isn't absolutely atrocious (but not good), I gave it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Product Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty junky
customer_reviews.text: I bought these against my better judgement after reading previous reviews. The earbuds are extremely comfortable for a women or child (someone with small ears). Other than that the sound doesn't work very well. In order to make the volume clear I had to wrap the volume up/down button with black electrical tape to hold the button down. Otherwise it sounded like only one earbud was working. I will keep them only because I use them at work to drown out talkative coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: B.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great samsung earphone
customer_reviews.text: I'm a samsung user for almost 8 years. Got my s7 like 3 years ago and never updated cos I like physical buttons. And the earphone that came with the phone worked for 3 years with no problem. However these earphones were not designed to last long due to wire bending wrapping all the time. There are "OEM" samsung earphone on amazon and ebay, but I bought SEVEN of them from the same/different sellers. ALL of them either didn't work, or are knock offs. This one although is $15, it works and the sound quality is better, they also have extra earphone covers. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but died in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: They survived exactly 3 months before the right ear piece got stopped working, I really loved this headphones and after swapping in and out the little extra pads of different sizes that was included in the box and messing around with a decent playlist I could spend HOURS listening to music while working without noticing I still had them on, I really loved this but sadly they hit the bucket way to early for my liking, gets my on quality, comfort, mic and quick controls that work, at least on Android phones.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: The rest of the reviews say it all. Good simple headphones for a good price. The covers with the little thingies that go inside your ear and also kinda around are amazing; usually that type is only found on high-priced earphones. They keep the piece in your ear when running, etc. Really like these.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Headphones that stay put during exercise
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones a little over a month ago after my old running ones wore out. If you're looking for headphones that won't slip out of your ears, these definitely have that covered. I also liked how they came with various sizes of the in-ear pieces. The only downside is that I just started experience audio issues when the headphone cord is wrapped a certain way. I wrap the extra cord around my phone when I run so it's not flying all over the place, and when the cord is bent at the location where it connects to the jack, the audio goes in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Constant Clicking Noise.  But good fit
customer_reviews.text: The made a constant clicking noise when plugged into any device. I tried 5 different devices but the same constant clicking on everyone. I did like the fit. I sent them back and a replacement pair. If the new pair work, I’ll edit the review. Edit- I got the replacements. Still have the same issue for multiple devices. Maybe I just have bad luck but I won’t be trying a 3rd time
customer_reviews.author: JayMoney$916

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Headsets marketed for exercise - yet not at all water resistant to sweat or light exposure to rain. After only three uses the inline controls malfunctioned and audio in left ear-bud crackled and eventually failed completely. I tried the headphone in three separate Android devices with exact same results. I would not recommend this product. In effect your are paying a 100% premium for the rubber ear-plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Gold standard for wired earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and sounds amazing. (works with UHQ setting for Galaxy devices). At full volume I can tune out my environment pretty well, even when my settings are set to bass/instrument over treble/voice. Would definitely buy again. Did not get to try out the in line control panel because I accidentally washed them with laundry and it shorted out.... But both speakers still work perfectly! If you've got a smartwach then you won't even miss the in line controls since you can change songs with your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kymon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Previous Headphones died, so needed new ones
customer_reviews.text: This headphones kick ass, i used them the first day they arrived, and i absolutely fell in love with them. Now i used them all the time, and definitely, if they get messed up tomorrow, i'll buy these ones again. 100% Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Carlos Molina

customer_reviews.title: Real deal Samsung !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal hi-fi stereo digital sound from Samsung - not an imitation with Samsung logo made by 3-rd party which I also purchased by being fooled < you buy 3 pairs for about $ 10 kind of a deal >. Comparing both real and fake Samsung you can tell this one is completely different with sound quality ! way ahead of a Mickey Mouse Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: marker1

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT LAST LONG AT ALL!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do not last long at all! I purchased these headphones May 4th. They stopped working June 28th. I thought these would last longer since they were priced more than regular $6 headphones. If anything this pair lasted 2 days longer. I will never purchase these headphones again! The only positive thing that I have to say is that I appreciate how the bud itself sits comfortably on the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite all around cable headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. I have bought at least 4 pairs since I got my phone. They are cheap, sound great and have a good microphone in them. My work requires me to be on calls continuously. My computer recognizes these as a headset, so setup is minimal. I've been on 8 hr calls with them and they don't hurt as much as other brands/designs. I also run with them and they stay put. Overall, a good product I recommend to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Christian J. Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Best headset in this price rang.
customer_reviews.text: All my devices other than PS4 are apple products so naturally I've been in favor of apple products over any other brands. I've bought this item to use for PS4 (Both headphone and mic) and worked great. The surprise was when I tried this headset on my Mac book!!! Overall sound quality, clarity, base, and intensity (Volume) had significantly improved from all of my other Apple headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Aydin

customer_reviews.title: I really like these headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are my all purpose, go-to headphones. These are good for work meetings on computer, phone conversations and working out. The fit is as expected and the cord is plenty long for my needs. Some may find it a little bit too short. Overall, this is a good purchase and I'll likely buy another pair if my current pair goes out.
customer_reviews.author: bigbearsfan

customer_reviews.title: They get caught on everything
customer_reviews.text: They work great, great sound quality and fit extremely well, the issue is that they are made of a rubber that gets caught on everything. The part earbud part is all so hook shaped and gets caught on almost everything. This also puts unnecessary ware on the wires. They are constantly being ripped out of my ears by simply going though a door and them getting caught on the door nob or bending over with one earbud dangling and then it gets caught on an edge. They're great if you put them through your shirt and tuck the remaining cord in your pocket but I don't recommend using them like you would normal earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had bad problems with earbuds falling out, but these earbuds have solved that problem! The little wings on top fit snugly inside my ears and keep the earbuds firmly and comfortably in place. I can wear them for hours and they don't even slip. The sound quality is excellent, and the remote on the cord is convenient to have, too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Norton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: These are better than all the $100, $200 and more competitors. I've never used this style with this strange shape ear bud, I'm replacing my older Samsung earbuds that came with my Galaxy S8. These are even better which is hard to believe. I put them in my ears and they just stick no matter what. The sound quality is like that of top quality surround sound. Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: GVG

customer_reviews.title: I really love these
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. Sound quality is very clear and they are super comfortable. I love the ear hook because it really helps them stay in your ears securely. I mostly love the fact that they are hybrids and not totally in-your-ear (which makes me feel like I'm suffocating in comparison). The mic quality is clear and these are overall just great earbuds. Definitely worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are great . I love the sound and when I have meetings the people on the another end can hear me clearly .
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Thought they were black but they came in blue. Also hurt a little if you wear them for very long periods of time but that may just be my little ears.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that extra ear tip buds were included...the original ones were a bit uncomfortable but I guess that has to do with my ear canal. Otherwise the earphones work perfectly all the time. They help me when I drive so I do not have to touch the phone to end my calls or control the volume
customer_reviews.author: Shikara Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great buy especially for those of us active lifestyles
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought these headphones! It was well packaged and came with a packet of replacement pieces for the rubber coverings. None of the replacements have the hook part tho but it's fine since I didn't expect extras anyway. They fit really snug which you get uaed to after a couple wears. Once you fit the hook part in your ear it doesn't fall out unless it's pulled really hard which makes it great for working out/active lifestyles. Audio is on 10 and the control buttons allow you to raise & lower the volume and pause your music. Overall it's def worth the price, i have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Small and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Small, good sound, durable, changeable outserts or covers for the ears Cons: May still be a bit uncomfortable on the ears; depends on the individual. Hopefully, my reasoning is sound 🥁 [Bah Dum Tiss] ;-D
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. I've recently had a lot of problems with headphones while running. They would either fall out of my ears or they would start to short out when I get sweaty. I've taken these on a couple 2 hour runs and never have a problem. They fit comfortably, never are at risk for falling out, never short out on me, and I like the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Thonus

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original Samsung earbuds
customer_reviews.text: My original Samsung earbuds disappeared and I bought a few other "comparable" ones that actually did not compare. So I decided I wanted a pair or the real Samsung earbuds and these are the real deal. These are just like my original pair
customer_reviews.author: Ms B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Great for small ears
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing to me how great the sound quality of these headphones is for so cheap. They sound at least as good as apple if not better. Also, I have very small ears and it took me forever to find headphones that actually fit well and these are awesome in fit. They are also very durable. I have had them for a year now and no problems whatsoever. They are rarely tangled. No signs of fraying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphones for Gamers
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them. He is very picky when it comes to headphones. Doesn't like the big over ear ones for gaming and because he owns a XBOX One X he cannot use bluetooth devices. Finding a wired headphone with mic that did not bother his ears took 3 years of trying different cheap ones and expensive ones. This was my best purchase for him so far and I have added others to my cart for back ups the price is amazing give them a try. New Yorker Review
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad ear buds and bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Please never ever buy this product, there is no customer service rep. To help you if have problem. This my 3 pair i will never buy this product again. I suggest no one buys this product. The ear does not work on right side. Again worst product and worst customer service in trying to resolve any issue. Also I am on hold with customer services writing this review, been on hold for about 18 minutes. Still no help.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst sound quality, and they fit great in my ear. After about a month with these earbuds they started making static noises and crackled when it was above half volume and I ended up throwing them away for another pair. Pretty good earbuds for working out while they lasted though.
customer_reviews.author: Owen C

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Samsung 7 edge. They have good sound quality. Volume control is good. Answering calls and hanging up calls is not reliable. I use them to listen to books as well on my phone with these and it works well. I like them overall.
customer_reviews.author: lkj

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because many reviews said these were very comfy in your ear and sounded amazing.. nope, neither is true. I've tried all 3 rubber inserts that fit into the ear and all 3 make my ears sore after a few minutes. As for sound quality, mediocre at best. I'll probably keep them but I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Just as good, if not better sound quality than the headphones ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as good, if not better sound quality than the headphones I originally received with my Samsung S6 Edge. My original headphones had a weird habit where the wire inside the plastic cord moved around and was quite visible, but these don't seem to have that problem at all. They came with a bunch of different rubber earbud sizes, and ones designed for running stay in place when you're moving around. Would highly recommend, and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Secure, comfortable, good sounding ear buds!
customer_reviews.text: The only earbuds I've found that stay put when I'm exercising. They don't fall out when I'm jogging or sweating a lot. They have good quality sound despite the fact that they could be in my ear a little better. They're not snug in the ear, but they are secure. It seems like they compensated for that because the bass and treble still sound very good. I just have to turn the volume up a little bit. I've been through 8 different earbuds and these are the only ones that actually stay secure in my ear and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Works with new PS4 controller
customer_reviews.text: Works with new Sony PS4 controllers. Bought a new controller and nothing would pair. My mic wouldn't work until I realized Sony owns Samsung and bought these. Finally I have a working mic on PS4 again. Thank me and buy this
customer_reviews.author: ddm4v7

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issue
customer_reviews.text: There's a faint but noticable clicking sound in one earbud, so I'll be returning them. Perhaps a bad copy / poor quality control. Too bad, because the fit is surprisingly comfortable and the buds don't fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Firewood

customer_reviews.title: Covers All Aspects in Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the sound quality its better then those low end headphones and the bass is great its for its price and sound like a high quality headphones. The eargels fit perfectly into the ear causing no irritation and they come with extra eargels without wings and those and better for comfort but it becomes easier to come out when you are active and moving about. Durability still needs some improvement seems little cheap but i think itd last atleast 1 year.But overall I love the product
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Abinsay

customer_reviews.title: Never lose a pair again
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these headphones. They are perfect for your ear and never comes out unless you pull them out. I hate headphones because they never seem to stay in my ear. I have to always push them in or readjust which is really annoying. These are perfect for ME!!! Very comfortable and soft. I love how they sit in the inner part of your ear. I will buy these again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3 months and then one side gave out
customer_reviews.text: Great for 3 months and then one side gave out. On top of that, the ear slips constantly comes off. I had to buy replacements separately from the ones that it came with. The only reason why I gave it 3 stars was for the quality while it worked and the comfort of it while it was being worn.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for my bose soundsport headset that recently broke. I wanted something that would stay in my ears when I run and could also be used as a headset for phone calls. These are great so far. The sound is great, the mic works great, and they were only a fraction of what I paid for the bose ones! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy Them... While They Last
customer_reviews.text: Just like others have said, they sound great, fit great, and controls work great... but you'll be lucky to get 6 months of both ears working out of them. But for the price, buying two pair a year isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: L. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: I've been happy with these earphones. A lot of the newer earphones sold have shapes that are really uncomfortable for my ears, but these fit well, and they stay in my ears. Sound quality is good, and they last a reasonably long time.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. My son wears these constantly for both working out and for leisure use and they have held up well. The sound quality is good and they are comfortable. The price was much better than buying them directly from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Liv D.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, and sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, good quality sound, didn't think they would stay in my ears without the ear loops but it does very well, I can't even feel them in my ears just good tunes while I am either on the treadmill or exercise bike.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Walker

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how many earbuds I ordered that sounded like crap. But these are perfect. I can run with them no problem. Little big and the fit gives an ear ache but I can get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Cord is tangle free. The color is unque. The sound quality is great. The soft gel piece that goes into the ear attracts every fiber, dust and lint that passes its way
customer_reviews.author: Sheka

customer_reviews.title: Good buy if you like wired earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these earbuds. Only problem that I have had is the wire gets stretched out and I tend to lose 1 of the earbuds, but I'm hard on them.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: 1 month life - no bueno
customer_reviews.text: They are great for about a month! Then they fail and you cant hear from one side. I'm on my 3rd pair and when I look back at the length of time they all died after 4-6 weeks. No bueno!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: Clear sound, very loud. I've only had the headphones for 5 months, but have been satisfied thus far. I will say, this product works best when paired with a samsung device. When using the headphones on my Mac the sound quality diminishes greatly.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great, then they just stop working :(
customer_reviews.text: These have been one of my favorite sets of headphones ever, that is for 5 months. They sounded great, stayed in well, all that. So freaking disappointing when they give no cue as to an issue and then one day just nothing :(
customer_reviews.author: naomi patton

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far my favorite style of wired earbuds samsung ever produced. They fit comfortably and I don't even worry about them falling out! The sound quality is amazing and they use the style of earbud that I absolutely adore! Everyone should definitely give these amazing set a try! I promise you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Quality and cost
customer_reviews.text: So far great I lost the headphones that came with my note 9 and needed a replacement. These are great for the price and sound better than the ones I lost. Life is good again. I do a lot of walking for exercise etc and use my headphones a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Good to Have On Hand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these ear buds after losing the pair that came with my S9 phone. Holds well around ears, great sound quality when on phone calls and listening to audio
customer_reviews.author: Elmy E. Escalante

customer_reviews.title: Only because the S9+ headphones went out in 1 ear (April-Oct)
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the volume button and power/next button. It containes 4 pair of ear "plugs"...you get what I mean. I needed the R1+L1. The sound was PAR...thatthat's all I have to say about the sound. These are a navy blue, not black.
customer_reviews.author: theunthinkable2

customer_reviews.title: They actually stay in your ear and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these headphones! They are much better than any headphones I have ever had! They actually stay in without falling out and are most comfortable once I've ever worn. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H

customer_reviews.title: Fantastical head phone!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. The sound quality is great. I use them at the gym and during work as a landscaper. I'm able to phase out the bickering of my children and slide into musical bliss. If you're looking for good quality headphones to escape the torture of being a parent then look no further. I bought a pair for my wife and now family road trips are amazing. Are the kids fighting in the backseat? Who knows, I'm jamming out to Led Zeppelin.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with no volume control
customer_reviews.text: The fit incredibly well, the only issue I have is not being able to control pausing or volume AT ALL with them. Other than that the quality of sound is pretty decent and they are comfortable enough to wear for a few hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the phone
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Nokia Windows Phone, they are very comfortable and stay in place. The microphone works great. I use these for talking on my phone most of the time, they are not in the same league as the high end noise cancelling headphones for music or movies, but a super deal for quality, comfortable and reliable phone use.
customer_reviews.author: T. McG

customer_reviews.title: Fits Ears GREAT, Does Not Work Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love these because of how they fit and stay in my ears (something NO other earbud does) but these don’t work. I’ve tried two pairs and both make popping noises while plugged in. I tried both pairs in my phone and my laptop, same results. 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rentz

customer_reviews.title: This is a Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: The "wings" that hold these ear phones in place during workouts are only provided for the SMALLEST ear phone covers. The other THREE covers are not provided with the wings! Which means if the small ear phone covers are not adequate to fit your ears - TOO BAD! Wear the 3 larger ear phone covers, sit back, do NOT move and enjoy your sound. How ridiculous is THAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Herring

customer_reviews.title: Great product and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to buy the headsets with 2 and it didn't last long. I discovered to pay a little bit more to get the Samsung headphone, the quality and material are excellent. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: PGlenn

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to buy another set of headphones because this set is the worst that I've ever purchased. It has a terrible sound quality, does not block out external noise (meaning I have to play my music on the highest volume and I STILL can hear the chatty kathys on public transport), and the right one falls out all the time when I'm running (which is the whole purpose of buying these in the first place). Very much avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jabbara

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones and really good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones and really good quality. I noticed that the price has gone up since I purchased my pair, but I would still recommend as I have not been the most gently with them and they are still working. Yes, I would recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerb714

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other knockoffs and didn't get the same quality. I've bought these from the store and they lasted for longer then the knockoffs. I'll definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever owned (including more expensive wireless headphones such as Beats, Sony and Jabra). These are extremely comfortable and the sound is excellent. I tested several other headphones prior to these. If you're looking for a pair of wired headphones, you won't find a pair better than these. Good job Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 pair for different vehicles.
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have bought more than 1 pair But the connect and disconnect button takes some getting used to because it is small.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mooney

customer_reviews.title: They will last for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good earphones, but like many earphones they only last so long before 1 side stops working and then both. However, they sound well and are good while they last.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this product because it maintains position in my ear. The sound quality is good and the color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy & will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent just needs a little more Bass, for my liking, but definitely a great Buy this is my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Durability Problems
customer_reviews.text: This set of earbuds had good sound quality for its price, $18.00, but only while it lasted. The left speaker stopped working after two months even though I did not subject it to "extreme" use. It was just lying on my workstation and was used only when I felt the urge. I totally expected it to last more than the two months of semi-regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable earphones available!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the way these headphones feel to wear! I was severely disappointed when I bought my new Galaxy S8 and it didn't have these bad boys in them. I don't understand why those uncomfortable squishy in-ear headphones are so popular - these are truly where it's at. I considered taking a star off for there being no black color option, but the Midnight Sapphire is a perfectly fine compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and work just as well as the Samsung ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones work extremely well. They are durable, comfortable, and work just as well as the Samsung headphones that came with the phone. I haven't had any issues with the microphone or the volume control buttons. They are compatible with my Samsung S7.
customer_reviews.author: cheyjordan

customer_reviews.title: Knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Definitely knock offs, best I have come across yet. Packaging was good, clear printing, but they always match twist tie color to product (at least for white and black items). There's came with a brown one. That is why I gave a one star, will edit later if they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound quality. Only problem is that you can't change the volume/change to another call. Other than that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dedra J.

customer_reviews.title: Stay in place while others fall out
customer_reviews.text: I like how well they stay in place when my other headphones kept falling out. Good sound and quality.
customer_reviews.author: zo6

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price I paid. These inear headphones actually sound way better than the headphones that originally came with my phone. I gave them a 3 for durability because of the simple fact that Samsung headphones do not last long & you'll be lucky to get one or two years out of them. But for this price, I'll be ordering another pair anyway. So overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase 😁
customer_reviews.author: Allycat 😺🐾

customer_reviews.title: Great for phone calls and meetings!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for taking calls and meetings while at home from my phone and computer, they work great! Sound quality is fantastic and it fits in my ear for hours without discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm an all Samsung fan, Akg is good but wasn't better than original Samsung headphones. I'm not a bluetooth person. And I love the wired ones better. Never had a problem with it. Hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: Best cord headphones I've bought so far for this price and they are very comfortable. Definitely better than the ones that came with my samsung phone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Haven't tested for working out, but it's a great general-use pair of earphones.
customer_reviews.text: I had jumped from various earphones, trying to find one with volume control and a microphone for Android that wasn't $30. These are great. They do exactly what I had hoped, and they were only $16. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Pump up the volume
customer_reviews.text: Expected a little more with volume and bass but for the price is OK would not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Mojena

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Tried replacing Bose ear buds with these. Not even close. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: TSM35

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Serious glitches with these headphones. When they are plugged in Siri won't stop opening itself. The music will pause and play itself. It will also fast forward on its own. Unable to listen to music with these.
customer_reviews.author: Justyn

customer_reviews.title: Tangle free, phone control, very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to listen to music, answer my calls automatically when im busy or on the road. I love the quality of music and that you do not always have to use the phone to answer, pause or control the volume. One thing i dislike, after a 3 months at least, the ear gels comes out. ONLY DISADVANTAGE!
customer_reviews.author: Kershie

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got it for chatting. Since bluetooth tend to loose signals. Having a wired cord is better. I bought 5
customer_reviews.author: bigwin

customer_reviews.title: the controls worked for about 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions as to how the on and off buttons were to work or the volume control. Which they worked for about 24 hours. The volume, pause, on and off have to be controlled by my devise. What a pain in my-----. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: jbb

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: you get what you paid for....not the best sound...but good enough for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Tolosa

customer_reviews.title: Very good until they broke....
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in mid April of this year, and they lasted well until about last week, when one ear went out one morning and the other ear did too that same day, later in the afternoon. Lasted me about 6 months which, based on the comments and other reviews, seems to be about the average lifespan of these. They are extremely comfortable in the ear and I just wish they had lasted a bit longer, but what can you do?
customer_reviews.author: Coolio Julio

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and stay in place perfectly while I run. They also come with replacement silicone covers. I definitely recommend these, they are actually more comfortable than the ones my phone came with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: These broke after 3 months of using them they were great samsung products but they stop working after a couple of months of using them. I have gone through 6 pairs of these and each lasted about 3 to 4 months ever since i bought my samsung galaxy s7 edge
customer_reviews.author: andres q.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphones. I can be heard clearly. Sound quality is great
customer_reviews.author: P. S. monroe

customer_reviews.title: I love using these earbuds but they just simply do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I love using these earbuds but they just simply do not last long. I use these headphones daily and take pretty good care of them, but one ear has busted out after just a few months of use. They didn't even last until the warranty!! How can I get a replacement/refund for this??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good until it stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like it till it stopped working 2 months later. I usually buy cheap headphones and they typically last about 5 months. I opted for more expensive ones and the stopped working! I was just walking to class using them then one side cut off and the button stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: YogaRunner

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacements for Apple Earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on an iPhone forever until I switched over to an Android phone early this year. One of my main gripes was that the Apple Earbud controls didn't work with Android! I've always been a fan of the shape of those earbuds, and I was so glad to have found these Samsung ones. They're incredibly comfortable and come with a huge variety of different sized earbud covers to fill all ear types. Would definitely purchase again! In fact I just bought my boyfriend some as well :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but color is off
customer_reviews.text: In terms of sound quality, these are some of the best earbuds I've used. If you're looking for earbuds with deep bass and crisp trebles then buy these. My only complaint is that I ordered the Black Sapphire model, and what I received is more like a Navy Blue. Doesn't detract from the quality at all, but it is off from what I expected to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Gopi

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and faulty
customer_reviews.text: These are really cheap headphones and not even close to the originals. Didn't work with any of the 6 different devices I tried with. Also the cable wasn't tied when I opened so most likely it was a returned item that was reshipped.
customer_reviews.author: Niya

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality excellent. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace the OEM earbuds. Definitely better than the originals. Very comfortable and the cord is more pliable than the originals, that would kink and twist.
customer_reviews.author: Marlin Bizzle

product_meta.title: Samsung Active InEar Headphones for Universal/SmartPhones, Retail Packaging - Black Sapphire - EO-EG920LBEGUS
product_meta.description: Color:Black SapphireThe Samsung Active In-Ear Headphones is perfect for the active listener. It combines comfort, stability and high-quality audio into a stylish and compact package. Large 12mm speaker units give the Active serious sound while the contoured ear gels with stabilizing wings make it comfortable enough for long term wear and stable enough for the treadmill.
feature_bullets: The Active In-Ear Headphones ship with 4 sets of interchangeable soft gel tips for a customized fit. The ultra-soft, contoured gels reduce unwanted noise and improve audio quality.
In-line 3-button remote with volume, send/receive phone control, and microphone (compatible with Samsung smartphones)
Large 12mm speaker units give active listeners serious sound
Tangle-free flat cable available in four colors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,379 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
